description: Convert aFITS image to a CASA file

parameters.name: fitsimage
parameters.info: Name of input image FITS file

parameters.name: whichrep
parameters.info: If fits image has multiple coordinate reps, choose one

parameters.name: whichhdu
parameters.info: If its file contains multiple images, choose one (0 = first HDU, -1 = first valid image).

parameters.name: zeroblanks
parameters.info: Set blanked pixels to zero (not NaN)

parameters.name: defaultaxesvalues
parameters.info: List of values to assign to added degenerate axes defaultaxes==True (ra,dec,freq,stokes)

parameters.name: beam
parameters.info: List of values to be used to define the synthesized beam [BMAJ,BMIN,BPA] (as in the FITS keywords)
